content:
I think I'm leaning towards creating a YouTube channel. I enjoy sharing my experiences and knowledge through video, and I think it would be a great way to showcase my coins and connect with other collectors. I'm a bit concerned about the equipment and editing aspect, but I'm willing to learn and invest in the necessary tools.

Regarding equipment, what kind of camera and microphone would you recommend for a beginner? And what editing software is user-friendly and suitable for creating high-quality videos?

Also, do you have any tips on how to structure my videos and make them engaging for viewers? Should I focus on specific topics, like coin reviews or collecting tips, or should I try to create more general content that appeals to a wider audience?
